name: Calm Skies
summary: Experience the thrill and tranquility of flying in Calm Skies. Perfect your wingsuit skills as you explore diverse biomes, dodge obstacles, and perform daring tricks to complete skill-testing challenges. Customize your character and enjoy a unique blend of excitement and serenity in the skies.
